title: China-Canada trade breakthrough: Beijing eases agriculture tariffs after Mark Carney visit
desc:
China has announced to suspend some tariffs on Canadian agricultural products after Prime Minister Mark Carney struck an initial deal with Beijing during high-level talks in January.

title: QuickCheck: Was 7% the highest EPF dividend payout in Malaysia?
desc: WITH the Employees Provident Fund set to announce its dividend rates for 2025 on Saturday (Feb 28), Malaysian workers are eagerly anticipating what returns they'll receive on their retirement savings.

title: Rwanda: RDF Army Chief On Official Visit to Mozambique
desc: The Army Chief of Staff of Rwanda Defence Force (RDF), Maj Gen Vincent Nyakarundi, on Thursday, February 26 began an official visit to Cabo Delgado Province in Mozambique, reaffirming ongoing security cooperation between the two countries in the fight against terrorism.

title: Kerala High Court lifts stay on release of Kerala Story 2 movie
desc: A Division Bench of Justices SA Dharmadhikari and PV Balakrishnan lifted the stay imposed by single-judge Justice Bechu Kurian Thomas on Thursday.

title: Newcastle news: Eddie Howe urges Anthony Gordon to stay 'fully focused' amid Arsenal talk
desc: Head coach Eddie Howe has urged Anthony Gordon to stay "fully focused" after the Newcastle United forward was linked with a move to Arsenal.

title: Stanbic Bank Ghana leads US$205m financing for Engineers & Planners:
desc: The five-year facilities, structured in two tranches (US$110 million and US$95 million), will support E&P’s ongoing contract mining operations, particularly its long-term engagement with Gold Fields Ghana Limited (Gold Fields Ghana). Ecobank Ghana PLC and Absa Bank Ghana LTD participated as key lending partners, underscoring strong collaboration within Ghana’s banking sector to mobilise capital at scale.

title: Arne Slot delivers ominous Florian Wirtz injury update with Liverpool star set to miss West Ham clash
desc: Liverpool boss Arne Slot has delivered an ominous injury update on Florian Wirtz, with the Dutchman admitting that he is unsure when the German playmaker will be available again. Wirtz, who picked up a problem when warming up ahead of the Reds’ Premier League trip to Nottingham Forest, will definitely sit out a home date with relegation-threatened West Ham on Saturday.

title: Strengthening Traditional Medicine: WHO Launches New Collaborating Centre
desc: The Charité Competence Center for Traditional and Integrative Medicine (CCCTIM) at Charité Universitätsmedizin in Berlin has been designated as the WHO Collaborating Centre for Traditional, Integrative, and Preventive Medicine for the next four years.
